rows.label: bf11880100_0010
rows.name: You won't come back?

rows.label: bf11880100_0020
rows.name: This is the road I must walk.

rows.label: bf11880100_0030
rows.name: Our paths won't cross...

rows.label: bf11880100_0050
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf11880100_0060
rows.name: ...Should we in fact ever meet again...

rows.label: bf11880100_0070
rows.name: On that day...

rows.label: bf11880100_0075
rows.name: Torna - The Golden Country

rows.label: bf11880100_0080
rows.name:
Nintendo and MONOLITHSOFT are the authors of this 
software for the purpose of copyright. All rights reserved.

rows.label: bf11880100_0090
rows.name: © 2017 Nintendo / MONOLITHSOFT

rows.label: bf11870100_0010
rows.name: In the course of a lifetime...

rows.label: bf11870100_0020
rows.name: a man will see uncountable meetings and partings.

rows.label: bf11870100_0030
rows.name: Yet, as your life's candle sputters and dies...

rows.label: bf11870100_0040
rows.name: whose face is it that rises to greet you?

rows.label: bf11870100_0050
rows.name: Happy is the man who can sleep...

rows.label: bf11870100_0060
rows.name: ...in the comfort of the smile he sees then.

rows.label: bf11870100_0070
rows.name: No...

rows.label: bf11870100_0080
rows.name: I don't wish for "forever".

rows.label: bf11870100_0090
rows.name: Even just for one moment...

rows.label: bf11870100_0100
rows.name: It's enough...if it's with her.

rows.label: bf11870100_0110
rows.name: And yet...

rows.label: bf11870100_0120
rows.name:
What is the man to do...who has
not been afforded that chance...?

rows.label: bf11870100_0130
rows.name: The road stretches on without end.

rows.label: bf11870100_0140
rows.name: I cannot but walk down it.

rows.label: bf11870100_0150
rows.name:
As long as I keep walking, I can hold out hope
that one day, the time may come...

rows.label: bf11870100_0160
rows.name: when I see her smile again.

rows.label: bf11870100_0170
rows.name: That hope keeps me afloat...
